org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messaging

Interface Transport<RESPONSE_TYPE>

  • Type Parameters:
    RESPONSE_TYPE - The type of response.
    All Superinterfaces:
    ResponseProcessor<RESPONSE_TYPE>

    public interface Transport<RESPONSE_TYPE>
extends ResponseProcessor<RESPONSE_TYPE>
    A callback passed to the Request.processRequest method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JAContext getJAContext()
      Returns the JAContext of the request source.
      void processException(java.lang.Exception response)
      Returns an exception as a response instead of throwing it.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messaging.ResponseProcessor

        processResponse

    • Method Detail

      • getJAContext

        JAContext getJAContext()
        Returns the JAContext of the request source.
        Returns:
        The JAContext of the request source, or null when the request was passed using signal or call.

      • processException

        void processException(java.lang.Exception response)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns an exception as a response instead of throwing it. But regardless of how a response is returned, if the response is an exception it is passed to the exception handler of the actor that did the call or send on the request.
        Parameters:
        response - An exception.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
